Encounter.Name: Encounter S-Comm
Encounter.Notes:
The following optional Rebel crew members may be added to this encounter if needed (requires adversaries from the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook): [P]
  • [B]20 Comm Techs[b] (use "Imperial Naval Engineers", 4 groups of 5 each)
  • [B]2 Officers[b] (use "Imperial Army Officer")
[P] All Rebel crew members are unarmed.
